nodes.text: Jimbo Kinnison was a failed Jedi operating during the Galactic Civil War, and wielded a lightsaber. He was tempted by the dark side of the Force, and drew on its power, but had not fully fallen to it. At some point, he was engaged by the smuggler, Roark Garnet, in melee combat. Garnet was armed with a club, while Kinnison brandished his lightsaber. Garnet swung the club hoping to hit Kinnison, while Kinnison replied by attempting to parry the strike.
